Source.Name: getxbook
Source.Summary: getxbook is a collection of tools to download books from Google Books, Amazon and Barnes & Noble.
Source.Description: getxbook is a collection of tools to download books from Google Books' "Book Preview" (getgbook), Amazon's "Look Inside the Book" (getabook) and Barnes & Noble's "Book Viewer" (getbnbook).

Package.Name: getxbook
Package.Summary: getxbook is a collection of tools to download books from Google Books, Amazon and Barnes & Noble.
Package.Description: getxbook is a collection of tools to download books from Google Books' "Book Preview" (getgbook), Amazon's "Look Inside the Book" (getabook) and Barnes & Noble's "Book Viewer" (getbnbook).
